column3: Resources Required (0 = none; 5 = hard and expensive)
column4: Positive Impact on Security (0 = negligible but good practice; 5 = dramatic improvement)

column1: Manage all software on office devices

column2: When doing work, never connect to anonymous, open hotspots like in a cafe.
If staff are frequently without internet, the organization should consider purchasing USB modems for staff use
Consider buying staff who work outside of the office, a VPN service so they can protect their activity while they work online.
Use a password and WPA2 encryption on your home or office wifi network.
Change the office password for the wifi router once a month
